def func(a,b,c,d):
  f=d+((13*a-1)/5)+c+(c/4) +(b/4)-2*b
  if(f<0):
   s=f/7
   t=-s*7+f
   return t+7
  return f%7
l=[int(i) for i in raw_input().split()]
k=int(l[0])
m=int(l[1])
y=int(l[2])
if m>2 and m<11:m-=2
else:m+=10
st=str(y)
C=int(st[:2])
p=int(st[2:4])
d={0:"Sunday",1:"Monday",2:"Tuesday",3:"Wednesday",4:"Thrusday",5:"Friday",6:"Saturday"}
v=func(m,C,p,k)
print d[v]
